title: ‘Scenes From a Marriage’ Recap
description:
Mallory Rubin and Joanna Robinson share their thoughts on HBO’s ‘Scenes From a Marriage' and discuss how the series adds to the divorce genre.
Hosts: Mallory Rubin and Joanna Robinson
Production Assistant: Jonathan Kermah
